verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>, when Natan <WH5416> the prophet <WH5030> came <WH935> <WH8800> unto him, after he had gone in <WH935> <WH8804> to Bat-Sheva <WH1339>. Have mercy <WH2603> <WH8798> upon me, O 'Elohim <WH430>, according to thy lovingkindness <WH2617>: according unto the multitude <WH7230> of thy tender mercies <WH7356> blot out <WH4229> <WH8798> my transgressions <WH6588>.
Wash <WH3526> <WH8761> me throughly <WH7235> <WH8685> from mine iniquity <WH5771>, and cleanse <WH2891> <WH8761> me from my sin <WH2403>.
For I acknowledge <WH3045> <WH8799> my transgressions <WH6588>: and my sin <WH2403> is ever <WH8548> before me.

Against thee, thee only, have I sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and done <WH6213> <WH8804> this evil <WH7451> in thy sight <WH5869>: that thou mightest be justified <WH6663> <WH8799> when thou speakest <WH1696> <WH8800>, and be clear <WH2135> <WH8799> when thou judgest <WH8199> <WH8800>.
Behold, I was shapen <WH2342> <WH8797> in iniquity <WH5771>; and in sin <WH2399> did my mother <WH517> conceive <WH3179> <WH8765> me.
Behold, thou desirest <WH2654> <WH8804> truth <WH571> in the inward parts <WH2910>: and in the hidden <WH5640> <WH8803> part thou shalt make me to know <WH3045> <WH8686> wisdom <WH2451>.
Purge <WH2398> <WH8762> me with hyssop <WH231>, and I shall be clean <WH2891> <WH8799>: wash <WH3526> <WH8762> me, and I shall be whiter <WH3835> <WH8686> than snow <WH7950>.
Make me to hear <WH8085> <WH8686> joy <WH8342> and gladness <WH8057>; that the bones <WH6106> which thou hast broken <WH1794> <WH8765> may rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>.
Hide <WH5641> <WH8685> thy face <WH6440> from my sins <WH2399>, and blot out <WH4229> <WH8798> all mine iniquities <WH5771>.
Create <WH1254> <WH8798> in me a clean <WH2889> heart <WH3820>, O 'Elohim <WH430>; and renew <WH2318> <WH8761> a right <WH3559> <WH8737> spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> me.
Cast me not away <WH7993> <WH8686> from thy presence <WH6440>; and take <WH3947> <WH8799> not thy holy <WH6944> spirit <WH7307> from me.
Restore <WH7725> <WH8685> unto me the joy <WH8342> of thy salvation <WH3468>; and uphold <WH5564> <WH8799> me with thy free <WH5081> spirit <WH7307>.
Then will I teach <WH3925> <WH8762> transgressors <WH6586> <WH8802> thy ways <WH1870>; and sinners <WH2400> shall be converted <WH7725> <WH8799> unto thee.

Deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> me from bloodguiltiness <WH1818>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, thou 'Elohim <WH430> of my salvation <WH8668>: and my tongue <WH3956> shall sing aloud <WH7442> <WH8762> of thy righteousness <WH6666>.
O YY <WH136>, open <WH6605> <WH8799> thou my lips <WH8193>; and my mouth <WH6310> shall shew forth <WH5046> <WH8686> thy praise <WH8416>.
For thou desirest <WH2654> <WH8799> not sacrifice <WH2077>; else would I give <WH5414> <WH8799> it: thou delightest <WH7521> <WH8799> not in burnt offering <WH5930>.

The sacrifices <WH2077> of 'Elohim <WH430> are a broken <WH7665> <WH8737> spirit <WH7307>: a broken <WH7665> <WH8737> and a contrite <WH1794> <WH8737> heart <WH3820>, O 'Elohim <WH430>, thou wilt not despise <WH959> <WH8799>.
Do good <WH3190> <WH8685> in thy good pleasure <WH7522> unto TZiyon <WH6726>: build <WH1129> <WH8799> thou the walls <WH2346> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

Then shalt thou be pleased <WH2654> <WH8799> with the sacrifices <WH2077> of righteousness <WH6664>, with burnt offering <WH5930> and whole <WH3632> burnt offering <WH5930>: then shall they offer <WH5927> <WH8686> bullocks <WH6499> upon thine altar <WH4196>.
